name: Research Scientist for Geology and Geoscience data Analytics
description:
Research Scientist for Geology and Geoscience data Analytics

Aramco Research Center – Moscow is offering great job opportunities for R&D data scientists specialized in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) focused on geology and geoscience domains. The position does not separate the roles of research scientist and data scientist and requires to be very flexible and innovative to think and work outside the box. It will focus on translating frontier data analytics and machine learning techniques to research ideas and prototypes to be further deployed to upstream technologies. This will also require for the candidate to be able to grasp end to end geological data processing and analytics implementation for successful technology development to tackle business problems.

Key functions and responsibilities:

  • Develop data analytics and/or machine learning algorithms for geology and geoscience data analytics;
  • Identify and prepare training datasets;
  • Perform feature analysis and labeling;
  • Create performance metrics and tracking processes to measure the effectiveness of data science solutions;
  • Create a model prototype of data science algorithms for further testing and validation at different scale.

Key technical skills and competencies:

  • Depth of knowledge and experience with Python and its data analytics and machine learning libraries and packages (e.g. scikit-learn, Pandas, TensorFlow or PyTorch);
  • Proficiency in data analytics algorithms for various data types, such as tabular data, digital images and time series;
  • Hand-on experience with visualization and analytics software using commercial software (e.g. TIBCO spotfire) or creating interface prototypes (e.g. in C#);
  • Hand-on experience in data processing, cleaning, filtering, handling and operation with large quantities of structured and unstructured data;
  • Depth of knowledge in machine learning algorithms, such as supervised learning (e.g. Support vector machine, random forest, gradient boosting, artificial neural network), unsupervised learning (e.g. clustering, anomaly detection), deep learning (e.g. deep artificial neural network);
  • Good knowledge of feature engineering algorithms specific for oil and gas geology and geoscience domains to create features that make specific machine learning algorithms be applied, especially for time lapse or sequential data;
  • Hand-on experience in geological samples analysis (thin sections, drill cuttings and core data);
  • Working experience with analyzing X-Ray diffraction and X-Ray fluorescence data is preferred;
  • Ability to develop R&D software prototypes utilizing latest high-performance-computing (HPC) advances, containerization processes and data intensive AI and machine learning methods will be a plus Familiar with cloud platforms, Linux, Git;
  • Good communication skills in English (writing and speaking) are important. Please use profile in English applying for this role.
